Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view

Class ClientOut

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.ClientOut
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class ClientOut extends Thread
ClientOut is a thread class that manages the visual aspect of the CLI.

  • Constructor Details

    • ClientOut

      public ClientOut(BufferedReader socketIn, Socket socket)
      Constructor method for ClientOut, it maps every method with the string corresponding the message type received by the server
      Parameters:
      socketIn - buffered reader, it reads incoming messages from the server connection
      socket - connection socket with the server

      public void run()

    • draw

      private void draw(String color)
      Prints a symbol + representing a pawn in the relative color or _ if there isn't any pawn
      Parameters:
      color - The color code of pawn or null if the pawn isn't present in that position

    • printIslands

      private void printIslands()
      Decode to json the message field of the message received from the server as a list of LineClient and prints all the islands. Every StringBuilder parameter creates a string with the corresponding field of every island, every StringBuilder is added to the Table ArrayList to print horizontally all the islands in game. *
